Name: Wukong
AbilityDescription:
Wukong spins his staff around him, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and gaining Armor and Magic Resist for each enemy hit for 3 seconds

Damage : 160 / 240 / 360
Armor and Magic Resist : 50 / 75 / 100

Name: Talon
AbilityDescription:
Talon jumps to the furthest unit from the center of the board and stabs them magic damage. If this kills them, Talon heals.

Damage : 220 / 330 / 500
Heal : 150 / 200 / 250

Name: Sylas
AbilityDescription:
Sylas whirls his chains around him, healing himself for health and dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

Damage : 150 / 225 / 350
Heal : 160 / 180 / 210

Name: Renekton
AbilityDescription:
Renekton empowers himself for 8 seconds, gaining maximun Health, and causing his attacks to deal 6% of his maximum Health as bonus magic damage.

Health Increase : 250 / 325 / 400

Name: Poppy
AbilityDescription:
Poppy throws her buckler at the farthest enemy, dealing % of her Armor as magic damage. The buckler then bounces back. granting Poppy a shield that blocks damage.

Percent of Armor as Damage : 175% / 250% / 375%

Shield Amount : 250/ 300 / 375

Name: Nasus
AbilityDescription:
Mordekaiser transports the board into his realm for a few seconds, shredding the Magic Resist of all enemies, before summoning a building behind him and slamming it onto the board, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit.

Damage : 500 / 750 / 3000

Magic Resist Shred : 50% / 50% / 70%

Realm Duration : 4 / 4 / 6

Name: Lux
AbilityDescription:
Lux sends a lucent singularity at a random enemy's location that detonates after arrival. dealing to nearby enemies and reducing the Attack Damage of the enemy in the center by 40% for 4 seconds

Damage : 200 / 300 / 450

Name: Lulu
AbilityDescription:
Lulu fires a bolt of magic energy at her target, dealing magic damage to the first enemy and to subsequent enemies.

Damage : 240 / 360 / 540

Secondary Damage : 120 / 180 / 270

Name: Kayle
AbilityDescription:
Kayle's next 3 attacks smite her target, dealing physical damage to them and magic to enemies within one hex of them.

% Attack Damage : 150% / 150% / 150%

Damage : 20 / 30 / 45

Name: Gangplank
AbilityDescription:
Gangplank removes all crowd control from himself and fires a flaming bullet at his target. dealing magic damage and reducing healing by 30% for 8 seconds.

Damage : 240 / 360 / 540

Name: Blitzcrank
AbilityDescription:
Blitzcrank creates an empowered field around himself, reducing all damage taken by for 4 seconds.

Damage Reduction : 40% / 50% / 60%

Name: Ashe
AbilityDescription:
Ashe increases her focus for the next 4 seconds. gaining 47 Attack Damage ( Attack Damage + )

Percent Of Attack Damage : 45% / 50% / 55%

Damage : 15 / 25 / 35

Name: Yuumi
AbilityDescription:
Yuumi fires a curved missile at the furthest target in her attack range, dealing magic damage to the first unit hit.

Damage : 250 / 375 / 575

Name: Yasuo
AbilityDescription:
Yasuo fires a whirlwind at his target dealing magic damage and knocking up units hit for a few seconds. If the current position isn't the best, he will dash up to one hex to find a the most units in a line.

Magic Damage : 225 / 325 / 500

Duration : 1.25 / 1.5 / 1.75

Name: Vi
AbilityDescription:
Vi slams the ground in front of her and releases her stored energy, granting herself a health shield for 4 seconds, reducing the Armor of nearby enemies for 4 seconds and dealing physical damage.

Shield Amount : 325 / 400 / 500
Armor Reduction % : 40% / 50% / 70%

Name: Sivir
AbilityDescription:
Sivir throws her pizza at her target, dealing physical damage. It then splits into slices and gets delivered to the nearest allies, healing them for health.

Allies Healed : 3 / 3 / 3

Healing : 80 / 100 / 125

Percent Of Attack Damage : 350% / 350% / 380%

Name: Rell
AbilityDescription:
Rell forms a tether between herself and her lowest percent health ally, dealing magic damage to all enemies between herself and her bound ally. She also grants herself and her bound ally % of Rell's current Armor and Magic Resist for 4 seconds.

% Armor and Magic Resisit : 40 / 50 / 60

Damage : 150 / 225 / 375

Name: Malphite
AbilityDescription:
Malphite slams the ground beneath him, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and granting himself armor for 4 seconds.

Damage : 140 / 210 / 320

Armor : 80 / 100 / 125

Name: Lee Sin
AbilityDescription:
If there is a nearby ally. Lee Sin dashes towards them, shielding both them and himself for 4 seconds. If there are no nearby allies. Lee Sin gains more health shield instead. Afterwards, he dashes back and deals physical damage to his target.

Percent Of Attack Damage : 250% / 250% / 275%

Name: Jinx
AbilityDescription:
Jinx fires a rocket at her target that explodes on impact, damaging all nearby enemies for magic damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

Name: Galio
AbilityDescription:
Galio steps back and dashes toward the nearest enemy, dealing magic damage. He then grant himself and the closest ally a health shield for 4 seconds.

Name: Fiora
AbilityDescription:
Fiora lunges at her enemy, dealing physical damage to all enemies hit and activates her Duelist's Soul for 8 seconds, While her Duelist's Soul is active, she takes 20% less damage and her attacks restore Health.

Heal : 30 / 40 / 55

Name: Ezreal
AbilityDescription:

Damage : 200 / 300 / 475

Name: Draven
AbilityDescription:
Draven hurls two massive axes at his target's direction that deal physical damage to all enemies in its path, reduced by 25% for each enemy they pass through. The axes reverse direction at the end of their path, dealing damage to enemies hit along the way back.

Damage : 65 / 100 / 175

Name: Camille
AbilityDescription:
Camille sweeps with her leg, dealing physical damage and disarming enemies hit.

AbilityDescription:

Name: Zoe
AbilityDescription:
Zoe launches a bubble at the nearest non-infected enemy's location, infecting all enemies hit with a virus that deals magic damage over 10 seconds. Infected enemies take more damage.

Name: Vel'koz
AbilityDescription:

Name: Vayne
AbilityDescription:
Vayne fires a heavy bolt at her target, dealing true damage.

Sona cycles between 3 phases, firing 2 beams that:

1: Deals magic damage to the closest enemies.

2. Heals the lowest health allies.

3. Deals magic damage and stuns the closest enemies.

Name: Senna

Name: Riven

Name: Rammus

Name: Nilah

Name: Kai'Sa
AbilityDescription:

Name: Cho'Gath
AbilityDescription:
Passive: Cho'Gath has increased Magic Resist.

Name: Alistar
AbilityDescription:
Alistar slams the ground underneath his target, dealing magic damage and knocking them up for 1.5 seconds. He then roars, healing himself and the lowest health ally champion for 15% of his maximum health.

Damage : 200 / 300 / 525

Name: Zed
AbilityDescription:
Zed teleports behind his target and marks them for death, shredding armor for a few seconds. He then enters an Empowered Kill Mode for a few seconds. While active, Zed's attacks deal an additional bouns physical damage and every third attack damages all adjacent enemies, dealing physical damage to adjacent enemies.

Bonus Damage : 30 / 45 / 120

Duration : 6 / 6 / 15

Name: Zac
AbilityDescription:

Blob Health : 40% / 40% / 50%

Name: Viego
AbilityDescription:
Viego becomes unstoppable, leaping to the largest cluster of nearby enemies and slamming his sword down on the enemy with the lowest health, dealing magic damage to the primary target and magic damage to enemies nearby. If Viego kills an enemy, he casts again with reduced damage.

Damage : 300 / 400 / 900

Name: Taliyah
AbilityDescription:

Name: Soraka

Empowered Stars : 3 / 3 / 6

Name: Sett
AbilityDescription:
Sett begins charging up, becoming immune to crowd control and gaining a health shield for 2.5 seconds. After the shield breaks or at the end of its duration, he unleashes a blast in a cone at the most enemies in range, dealing physical damage to all enemies inside. The damage increases up depending on how long he charged.

Name: Sejuani

Name: Samira
AbilityDescription:

Damage : 100 / 130 / 666

Name: MissFortune
AbilityDescription:
Miss Fortune channels for 2 seconds, firing 8 waves of bullets in a cone in her target's direction, with each wave dealing magic damage to the first target hit. Enemies hit by bullets in short succession take less magic damage for each bullet instead.

Reduce Damage : 25 / 35 / 80

Name: Ekko
AbilityDescription:

Damage : 120 / 180 / 1500

Name: BelVeth
AbilityDescription:
Bel'Veth dashes around her target and unleashes a flurry of attacks, each dealing physical damage.

Each time this is cast, Bel'Veth gains 25% bouns Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

Defense Shred : 40% / 50% / 70%

Name: Aurelion Sol
AbilityDescription:
Aurelion Sol calls down meteors on random enemies that explode on impact. Each meteor deals magic damage and applies a burn for 10 seconds, dealing % of the target's maximum Health as true damage and reducing incoming healing by 25%.

Damage : 210 / 320 / 450

% Health as Damage : 10 / 10 / 10

Name: Urgot
AbilityDescription:
Passive: Urgot's claw fires 5 attacks per second, each dealing physical damage.

Ability: Urgot summons a gigantic wave behind his enemies that moves towards him, dealing % of their maximum Health as magic damage. The wave collides with enemies knocking them forward 1 hex, stunning them, and grants a chance to dredge up TREASURE.

Max Health : 10% / 15% / 99%
Stun Duration : 1.25 / 1.5 / 5
Treasure Chance : 12% / 15% / 100%

Name: Syndra
AbilityDescription:
Syndra enshrounds a random unit on your bench in an orb, granting them a health shield and fllinging them onto the board towards the closest enemy, knocking up and dealing magic damage to any enemies hit. Traits are unaffected except Corrupted.

Shield Amount : 30 / 300 / 3000
Stun Duration : 1 / 1 / 8
Damage : 50 / 250 / 2000

Name: Nunu
AbilityDescription:
Passive: Nunu and Willump slowly roll a ball around the board, dealing magic damage to all enemies it passes through, and gaining 30 mana per second.

NuNu and Willump grow the ball, increashing their speed, radius of the ball, and its damage dealt by 50%.

Damage : 150 / 225 / 3333

Name: Mordekaiser
AbilityDescription:
Mordekaiser transports the board into his realm for a few seconds, shredding the Magic Resist of all enemies, before summoning a building behind him and slamming it onto the board, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit.

Damage : 500 / 750 / 3000

Realm Duration : 4 / 4 / 6

Name: Leona
AbilityDescription:
Leona locks onto and calls an orbital laser strike onto her target.

After a short delay a laser fires on the locked on target dealing true damage per second to the target and dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

Damage : 70 / 100 / 2000

Name: Janna

Janna sends a twister towards the largest group of units. Enemy units caught by the twister are knocked up for 0.5 seconds. When the twister stops, it expands and all nearby enemies are knocked up for a few seconds and take magic damage each second over 1.5 seconds.

Damage : 210 / 320 / 9000

Stun Duration : 1.5 / 2 / 3

Name: Fiddlesticks
AbilityDescription:
Fiddlesticks teleports into the largest cluster of enemies and fears them. For the next a few seconds, Fiddle drains the life from nearby enemies dealing magic damage per second and healing himself for 20% of the damage dealt.

Magic Damage : 120 / 180 / 2000

Spell Duration : 5 / 5 / 30

Name: Aphelios
AbilityDescription:
Player select a weapon when place Aphelios on board.

Binding Eclipse

Aphelios casts forth a lunar spotlight towards the largest group of units, dealing physical damage and stunning all enemies in the area.

Duskwave

Aphelios unleashes a wave of energy in a cone in his target's direction, dealing magic damage to all units hit and locking on to them. After a delay, Aplhelios fires a volley of attacks at each locked-on target, dealing physical damage.

Onslaught

Aphelion enters an onslaught for 1.75 seconds, automatically performing 6 attacks over the duration at the nearest 2 enemies, dealing physical damage to each enemy.

Binding Eclipse Base Damage : 75 / 110 / 2000

Binding Eclipse Stun Duration : 1.5 / 2 / 15

Duskwave Percent of Attack Damage : 250% / 250% / 800%

Duskwave Magic Damage : 75 / 110 / 600

Duskwave Num Bullets : 7 / 7 / 15

Onslaught Base Damage : 75 / 110 / 2000
